posts.title: C++实现自动生成 get和set方法
posts.text: C++自动生成get，set方法 PropertyBuilder.h1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526#ifndef PROPERTYBUILDER_H#define PROPERTYBUILDER_H#define PropertyBuilderByName(type, name, access_permission)\ access_permission:\ type m_##name;\ public:\ inline void set##name(type v) {\ m_##name = v;\ }\ inline type get##name() {\ return m_##name;\ }\#define PointerPropertyBuilderByName(type, name, access_permission)\ access_permission:\ type* m_##name;\ public:\ inline void set##name(type* v){\ m_##name = v;\ }\ inline type* get##name(){\ return m_##name;\ }\#endif // PROPERTYBUILDER_H 使用方法：12345678910#include "PropertyBuilder.h"class User{public: User(){} PropertyBuilderByName(int, UserId, private) PropertyBuilderByName(QString, UserName, private) PropertyBuilderByName(QString, UserPwd, private)};
